rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {3842} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC4650} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true
For COURSE_CODE NOT IN {3842, B6001} Do Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {ECC4650, ECF5410} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS} Otherwise true

description: Topics include development and application of microeconomic theory for the economic evaluation of (public) sector investment projects and policies; investment analysis and criteria, discounting techniques; Pareto potential improvement criterion, shadow pricing, social discount rates, distribution issues, secondary benefits, risk and uncertainty, cost-effectiveness.
